title: Hypothesis Testing
text: By the null hypothesis that the variances are the same, the F statistic is $$\frac{{s_1}^2}{{s_2}^2}$$, where s would denote the sample variance.

title: Test of Two Variances
text: Worker 1's variance is $$12.1$$, and worker 2's variance is $$16.9$$. divide worker 1's variance with worker 2's variance.
